page.title: 06HOME LIFE 2
page.content: THESE SHOPS ARE GOOD ENOUGH TO PROVIDE YOU WITH SOME MESSAGES BUT MOST OF THE SHOPPING IS DONE AT THE TOWN CENTRE.THERE IS A BUS STOP AT THE BOTTOM OF THE HILL WHICH IS 5 MINUTES WALK FROM MY HOUSE. MOST OF THE BUSES GO TO THE TOWN CENTRE, NORTH CARBRAIN OR GLASGOW. I LIKE THE HOUSES BECAUSE THERE IS A LOT OF ROOM IN THEM AND THERE IS A LOT TO DO NEARBY. THE HOUSES ALSO HAVE BACK AND FRONT GARDENS. I LIKE EVERYTHING ABOUT MY AREA. I DONT DISLIKE ANYTHING. I WOULD HATE TO LIVE ANYWHERE ELSE.
